message.raw: Fixed a bug where redirecting output in a subprocess failed with a Bad File Descriptor error. Now the redirect does not also write to the original stdout, which is where the breakage was happening (since on windows stdout can't be written to for long if there's no terminal on the other end...)
message.html: Fixed a bug where redirecting output in a subprocess failed with a Bad File Descriptor error. Now the redirect does not also write to the original stdout, which is where the breakage was happening (since on windows stdout can't be written to for long if there's no terminal on the other end...)
